targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_format") FROM "default"."system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$storageID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hoststorage$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$storageID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$metaID$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hoststorage$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100-last(available_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hoststorage$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT "targetConsistencyState" as "Consistency State", "diskSpaceFree" / (1024*1024*1024) as "GiB Free", "inodesFree" as "Inodes Free" FROM "storageTargets" WHERE "nodeID" =~ /^$storageID$/ AND time > now() - 30s GROUP BY "storageTargetID" ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$hoststorage$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$hoststorage$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$storageID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$storageID$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from storage with key = "nodeID"
list.label: Storage ID
list.name: storageID
list.query: show tag values from storage with key = "nodeID"

list.definition: select last("hostnameid") from storage  where nodeID =~ /^$storageID$/
list.name: hoststorage
list.query: select last("hostnameid") from storage  where nodeID =~ /^$storageID$/
